TunableList.name: ACTIONS
TunableList.description: A list of actions that are available to Story Progression.

TunableTuple.name: career_distribution
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableTuple.name: employment_rate
TunableTuple.description: The ideal employment rates. If the rate of employed Sims fall outside this interval, Sims will be hired/fired as necessary.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: sim_filter
Tunable.description: The subset of Sims this action can operate on.

TunableTuple.name: fame
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableTuple.name: time_of_day
TunableTuple.description: Only run this action when it is between a certain time of day.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: initial_population
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableTuple.name: _homeless_households
TunableTuple.description: Random number of homeless households to create.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: _region_to_population_density
TunableList.description: Based on region what percent of available lots will be filled.

Tunable.name: density
Tunable.description: Percent of how much of the residential lots will be occupied of all the available lots in that region. If the current lot density is greater than this value, then no household will be moved in.

Tunable.name: min_empty
Tunable.description: Minimum number of empty lots that should stay empty for this neighborhood.

TunableTuple.name: max_population
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

Tunable.name: culling_buffer_percentage
Tunable.description: When sim infos are culled due to the number of sim infos exceeding the cap, this is how much below the cap the number of sim infos will be (as a percentage of the cap) after the culling, roughly. The margin of error is due to the fact that we cull at the household level, so the number of sims culled can be a bit more than this value if the last household culled contains more sims than needed to reach the goal. (i.e. we never cull partial households)

TunableVariant.name: homeless_played_demotion_time
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, played Sims that have been homeless for at least this many days will be drops from FULL to BASE_SIMULATABLE lod.

TunableList.name: sim_info_cap_per_lod
TunableList.description:
The mapping of SimInfoLODLevel value to an interval of sim info cap integer values.
NOTE: The ACTIVE lod can't be tuned here because it's being tracked via the Maximum Size tuning in Household module tuning.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The number of sim infos allowed to be present before culling is triggered for this SimInfoLODLevel.

TunableTuple.name: time_of_day
TunableTuple.description: Only run this action when it is between a certain time of day.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: populate_action
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableList.name: _region_to_population_density
TunableList.description: Based on region what percent of available lots will be filled.

Tunable.name: density
Tunable.description: Percent of how much of the residential lots will be occupied of all the available lots in that region. If the current lot density is greater than this value, then no household will be moved in.

Tunable.name: min_empty
Tunable.description: Minimum number of empty lots that should stay empty for this neighborhood.

TunableTuple.name: _time_of_week
TunableTuple.description: Only run this action when it is between a certain time of the week.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: A Day, Hour(24hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a week.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: A Day, Hour(24hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a week.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableTuple.name: relationship_culling
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableTuple.name: time_of_day
TunableTuple.description: Only run this action when it is between a certain time of day.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

Tunable.name: minute

TunableTuple.name: rentable_lot_population
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableList.name: _region_to_rentable_zone_density
TunableList.description: Based on region what percent of available lots will be filled.

TunableList.name: _venues_to_populate
TunableList.description: A set of venue references that are considered to be rentable.

TunableList.name: bed_count_to_travel_group_size
TunableList.display: Bed Count To Travel Group Size
TunableList.description: Based on the house description how many sims should go on vacation

Tunable.name: Number of beds
Tunable.description: The number of beds on the lot to determine how many sims can go in the vacation group.

TunableVariant.name: Travel Group Size
TunableVariant.description: The maximum number of sims that should go on vacation to that lot.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A literal value that is to be used as the lower and upper bound of an interval. This allows both literal and range interval tunings in the same TunableVariant without having to manually set the lower and upper bounds to the same value.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The upper and lower bounds.

TunableTuple.name: random_in_range
TunableTuple.description: A tunable interval between lower_bound and upper_bound.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: density
Tunable.description: Percent of lots will be occupied once a user sim has rented a lot.

TunableVariant.name: duration
TunableVariant.description: The maximum in sim days npc's should stay on vacation.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A literal value that is to be used as the lower and upper bound of an interval. This allows both literal and range interval tunings in the same TunableVariant without having to manually set the lower and upper bounds to the same value.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The upper and lower bounds.

TunableTuple.name: random_in_range
TunableTuple.description: A tunable interval between lower_bound and upper_bound.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: household_description_to_ideal_travel_group_size
TunableList.display: Household Description To Ideal Travel Group Size
TunableList.description: Based on the house description how many sims should go on vacation

TunableVariant.name: Travel Group Size
TunableVariant.description: The maximum number of sims that should go on vacation to that lot.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A literal value that is to be used as the lower and upper bound of an interval. This allows both literal and range interval tunings in the same TunableVariant without having to manually set the lower and upper bounds to the same value.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The upper and lower bounds.

TunableTuple.name: random_in_range
TunableTuple.description: A tunable interval between lower_bound and upper_bound.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: min_to_populate
Tunable.description: Minimum number of lots that should be rented.

TunableList.name: travel_group_size_to_household_template
TunableList.display: Travel Group Size To Household Template
TunableList.description: Mapping to travel group size to household templates. If there are no household that fulfill the requirement of renting a zone, then random household template will chosen to be created to rent a zone.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: Household template that will be created for renting a zone.

TunableTuple.name: university
TunableTuple.description: An action defines behavior that is to occur on a certain subset of Sims affected by Story Progression.

TunableList.name: number_of_classes_to_take_on_reenrollment
TunableList.display: Number Of Classes To Take On Reenrollment
TunableList.description: A list of weighted numbers of classes to take when this story progression action re-enrolls a sim.

Tunable.name: number_of_classes
Tunable.description: The number of classes to take.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The relative chance of taking this number of classes.

TunableTuple.name: performance_gain_per_day
TunableTuple.description: The amount of work performance to give a university student per day.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: time_to_update_progress
TunableTuple.description: The approximate time of day when the action should update story progress.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour of the day

Tunable.name: minute
Tunable.description: Minute of Hour

TunableList.name: GLOBAL_DEMOGRAPHICS
TunableList.description: A list of demographics affecting the entire universe. This includes all worlds as well as townie Sims.

TunableTuple.name: employment
TunableTuple.description: Determine the number of employed Sims and compare it to a desired employment level.

TunableTuple.name: employment_rate
TunableTuple.description: The ideal employment rate. If the rate of employed Sims falls outside of this interval, Sims will be hired/fired as necessary.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: population_filter
Tunable.description: The subset of Sims this action can operate on.

Tunable.name: INTERVAL
Tunable.description: The time between Story Progression actions. A lower number will impact performance.
